container.name: Container
container.description: A container with a maximum width of $screen-lg-max
container.author: Kristoffer Svanmark

grid.name: Grid
grid.description:
HbgPrime's grid system is a 12 column responsive grid.
ATTENTION: Remove the .grid-example class before using.
grid.author: Kristoffer Svanmark

general.name: Headings
general.description: Headings for use within articles and more. Please always set the id attribute on headings to enable anchor-linking.

state.name: .highlight
state.description: Will highlight any heading in the current theme color

markup.modifier:
<button class="btn">Default button</button>
<button class="btn btn-submit">Submit button</button>
<button class="btn btn-lg btn-submit">Large submit button</button>
markup.example:
<button class="btn">Default button</button>
<button class="btn btn-submit">Submit button</button>
<button class="btn btn-lg btn-submit">Large submit button</button>

general.name: Stripe
general.description:
The iconic Helsingborg brand stripe.
ATTENTION: Do not use the gray stripe, it's only for demonstration purpose.
general.author: Kristoffer Svanmark

breadcrumbs.name: Breadcrumbs
breadcrumbs.description: Indicate the current page's location within a navigational hierarchy using breadcrumbs.
breadcrumbs.author: Kristoffer Svanmark

markup.modifier:
• Parent node
  • First child node
  • Current node
markup.example:

sidebar navigation.name: Navigation
sidebar navigation.description: Vertical navigation a.k.a sidebar navigation with nestled sub menu support.
sidebar navigation.author: Kristoffer Svanmark

state.name: .has-children
state.description: Indicates if a menu item has children (sub menu)

state.name: .current-node
state.description: Indicates the currently active parent node

navbar.name: Navigation bar
navbar.description: The navbar is typically used for the main menu. Using the class .nav-justify on the ul element will make the menu items fill the width of the navbar container.
navbar.author: Kristoffer Svanmark

state.name: .current
state.description: Indicates the currently active menu item
